ResourceHeader.ResourceName: CASSINI RPWS L3 Dynamic Spectra (Flux Density and Circular Polarization degree)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains 24h dynamic spectra plots of spectral flux densities (top panel) and circular polarization degree (bottom panel) measured by the RPWS/HFR instrument after a goniopolarimetric inversion. Plots are in PDF format.
